name: Karina Lee
description: Karina Lee is the presenter of her ownNetwork News 54show titled "Chip In", where new technology such as newcyberwareis being promoted. Karina has an upbeat and enthusiastic approach to hosting her show, showing excitement toward the newest cyberware she is presenting. She frequently will have new cyberware implanted into her body in order to demonstrate the positive and negative aspects of the technology.She has reviewed various products from large corporations includingArasaka,Dynalar Technologies,MoorE Technologies,Militech, and others. Karina has made a guest appearance onNight After...
